meanings.definition: A type of automobile roof that is rigid and does not fold or retract.
meanings.sent1: The classic cars at the car show all had hardtops.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic specializes in repairing hardtops on vintage cars.
meanings.sent3: The hardtops on the cars looked like they were wearing little hats.
meanings.sent4: The hardtops gleamed under the bright sun, reflecting the surrounding buildings.
meanings.sent5: The hardtops of the cars stood out in the parking lot, attracting attention.
